column5: Leah's boat all spiffy'd up again in Egyptian Princess colour...
I still remember standing on the dock watching Pete catch the winning pike on his Jumla
I forgot I had one on my old boat too Wayne, along with the original OF N sticker from days gone by. We sure had some fun times back in the day.

That was the "second generation" Jumla that Pete used though Lew, mfg'd by Avery! The original mystery bait originated on a BOQ gathering when Rick and I were fishing on a finger dock across from the Picton Inn and after Rick caught a fish someone asked what bait he was using and the rush was on to find the illusive Jumla in Egyptian Princess colour. A bait that never existed...
Yeah, I was referring to the bait Avery made Wayne.
Funny to see those Jumla Stickers.. lol.. on the day Avery Graduates with his Masters! - and Jaden also graduates with her Bachelors tomorrow!!
Great to hear both kids are doing so well TJ, it doesn't seem that long ago they were both so little.....or maybe it just means I'm getting old hahaha
Ah yeah the memories what year would that be. The memory is the second thing to go.
We were up at Bernie's a couple of weeks ago and he had one out for us to peruse. Brought back some good memories of BOQ gtg's we used to have. HH
